attributes.action: I am Olga,I live in Ukraine now and I apply for the political asylum I need to come to Great Britain
attributes.additional_details:
I am alive. I need help to come back to Great Britain.I need a new British passport. My name is Olga. I wrote a new name Olga Christoforova.Please, ask a good girl to come Ukraine to help me to apply for a new British passport and to give me new summer shoes.I need a political asylum because Ukrainian Zhytomyr regional court does not work right.It is corruption in it because I have a good mind I have no psychosis but Galyna Petrivna Hrystoforova made me  one injection every month without my permission and without medical examination.Victor Fedorovych Yanukovych is not a good President of Ukraine. He is a killer because I was a person subjected to repressions at the Zhytomyr oblast hospital for mental diseases in 2010 year during 4 months after my going to British Embassy, in 2011on  29th of July I ate oats sitting on the stone near with British  consular militia took me to hospital Pavlova to eat oats there.
I need a grant for food and clothes.
